description: This file defines a class 'BrowserbaseTools' that provides methods for browser automation tasks such as navigation, taking screenshots, retrieving page content, and managing browser sessions. It integrates with external libraries 'browserbase' and 'playwright' and manages browser sessions and resources.

classes.name: BrowserbaseTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for browser automation using Browserbase and Playwright, providing methods to navigate, capture screenshots, retrieve page content, and manage sessions.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the BrowserbaseTools class, setting up API keys, project ID, base URL, and preparing tools for browser automation.

methods.name: _ensure_session
methods.description: Ensures a browser session exists, creating one if necessary.

methods.name: _initialize_browser
methods.description: Initializes the browser connection, either from a provided connect URL or by creating a new session.

methods.name: _cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up browser resources such as closing the browser and stopping Playwright.

methods.name: _create_session
methods.description: Creates a new browser session and returns session details.

methods.name: navigate_to
methods.description: Navigates the browser to a specified URL.

methods.name: screenshot
methods.description: Takes a screenshot of the current page and saves it to a specified path.

methods.name: get_page_content
methods.description: Retrieves the HTML content of the current page.

methods.name: close_session
methods.description: Closes the current browser session and cleans up resources.
